channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: UK escapes worst of Trump's tariff wrath with 10% levy but warns of 'threat' to global economy
item.description: The U.K. escaped relatively unscathed compared with many other nations, facing the lowest trade tariff that Trump announced Wednesday.

item.title: Trump's tariffs incite fury in China and dismay in Europe
item.description: Trump unveils massive new tariffs on dozens of U.S. trade partners, dubs it "liberation day." Steep import duties send shockwaves through global marke...

item.title: White House estimate: Every 4% increase in tariffs leads to 1% price rise
Gold retreats but trades near record high
Small-cap stocks are on the verge of entering a bear market
How much Adidas, Nike and Puma source from heavily tariffed Asian countries
Adidas, Puma slump as European stock markets open with heavy losses
Trump Media shares drop after warning the president's trust and other insiders could sell stock
item.description: Insiders and major stakeholders, including the Donald J. Trump Revocable Trust, can sell stock "from time to time," the company disclosed in a filing.

item.title: Trump told Cabinet that Elon Musk will leave administration in coming months: NBC News

item.title: See Trump's list: More than 180 countries and territories facing reciprocal tariffs
item.description: Trump's plan sets a 10% baseline tariff across the board. But the president's list makes it clear that many countries will face significantly higher r...
